vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in TokenBank.withdrawToHolder (patch_14.sol#59-63):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_addr.call.value(_wei)()) (patch_14.sol#61)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holders (patch_14.sol#62)
